basics.name: Alyssa Voccia
basics.label: Web Developer
basics.summary: Web developer with a strong technical foundation and a growing interest in data analytics. Passionate about using data to uncover insights, drive decisions, and complement my development background with analytical skills.

work.name: Compensation Negotiator
work.summary: Designed and optimized data-driven web applications that streamlined real estate compensation workflows. Focused on automation, database efficiency, and user-centric solutions that improved agent productivity and reduced paperwork.
responsibilities: Designed and implemented automated workflows that reduced manual paperwork and improved completion rates of agent compensation agreements.
Built scalable MySQL-backed systems to manage agent data, ensuring high data integrity and consistency.
Developed enterprise and free product tiers, enabling brokerages to manage large data volumes and track KPIs centrally.
Partnered with stakeholders to identify process bottlenecks and deliver solutions that increased agent efficiency and reduced turnaround times.

work.name: The Signature Real Estate Companies
work.summary: Managed and improved a portfolio of 31+ websites, collaborating with stakeholders to deliver data-backed features and insights. Contributed to building proprietary databases and tools that enhanced lead generation, property discovery, and business decision-making.
responsibilities: Analyzed and maintained performance metrics across a portfolio of 31 websites, improving site reliability and security.
Collaborated with product managers to design features that enhanced lead generation, contributing to a measurable increase in user engagement.
Contributed to the development of an internal property database by aggregating and cleaning proprietary datasets, providing analysts and executives with a competitive market advantage.
Created reusable reporting and UI components to streamline search workflows, boosting property discovery and conversion rates.

work.name: Freelance
work.summary: Built custom web and analytics solutions, including a React e-commerce site with Shopify integration for a woodworking company.
responsibilities: Developed a custom React-based e-commerce platform for a woodworking company, integrating Shopify for seamless product management and order processing.

projects.name: Compensation Negotiator
projects.description: A web application that automates real estate compensation workflows.
highlights: Built with Laravel, Livewire, and MySQL
Implemented real-time chat & automated PDF generation and data processes to improve efficiency

projects.name: Signature One Luxury Estates
projects.description: A real-estate brokerage website showcasing luxury property listings.
highlights: Built interactive map-based property browsing using React & Google Maps API
Integrated advanced analytics tools to optimize lead generation

projects.name: VAV Customs
projects.description: A custom ecommerce store built with React and Shopify for payment processing.
highlights: Product management and shopping cart functionality

projects.name: Real Estate Market Analysis
projects.description: Analyzing housing market trends and building dashboards for clear visualization.
highlights: Built Python-based exploratory analysis and feature engineering on King County housing sales data
Developed interactive Excel dashboards with PivotTables and charts to visualize pricing trends and regional patterns
